maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/290/setti.orig: The tour does not include the river area. We've been there yesterday already.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/290/setti.text: La visite n'inclut pas le tour de la rivière. On est déjà venu ici hier.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/394/setti.orig: Japp, here it is. That large building right over there.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/394/setti.text: Japp, c'est là. C'est ce grand bâtiment juste ici.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/397/setti.orig: Don't go up there, they'll punch ya....
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/397/setti.text: Va pas par là, ils te casseront la figure...

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/402/setti.text: Oh, tu te sens déjà mieux ?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/402/setti.orig: Hi. Welcome to this small little hellhole.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/402/setti.text: Salut. Bienvenue dans ce petit coin de l'enfer.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.orig: Now take the fish and cook it up in the jelly for 2 hours...
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.text: Maintenant, prends le poisson et cuit-le dans la marmelade pendant deux heures...

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.orig: Add the sesame, season with pepper and oregano.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.text: Ajoute le sésame, saupoudre avec du poivre et de l'origan.
Et il se passe quoi après ?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.orig: Add lemon juice. Add the pineapple. Stir fry for 20 minutes.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.text: Ajoute le jus de citron. Ajoute l'ananas. Fait sauter le tout à la poêle pendant 20 minutes.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.orig: Cover in breadcrumbs, fry another 30 minutes.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.text: Couvre le tout avec des miettes de pain, et continue de faire sauter encore 30 minutes.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.orig: Wrap it with two layers of cheese. Deep fry for 15 minutes.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.text: Met-le entre deux tranches de fromage. Fait frire le tout pendant 15 minutes à feu doux.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.orig: Add water and bring it to a boil for 2 hours or until soft.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.text: Ajoute de l'eau et laisse-le bouillir pendant 2 heures, ou moins si c'est déjà mou avant.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.orig: Mix it all up in the blender and let it cool for an hour. That's how you make the jelly.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/407/setti.text: Mixe le tout dans le mixeur et laisse couler le tout pendant une heure. C'est comme ça qu'on fait la marmelade.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.orig: Hey you two! What is it with this place?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.text: Hé, vous deux ! C'est quoi le bins avec cet endroit ?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.orig: Add the sesame, season with pepper and oregano.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.text: Ajoute le sésame, saupoudre avec du poivre et de l'origan.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.orig: Hey! Are you listening to me?
Add lemon juice.\. Add the pineapple.\. Stir fry for 20 minutes.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.text: Ajoute le jus de citron.\. Ajoute l'ananas.\. Fait sauter le tout à la poêle pendant 20 minutes.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.orig: W-What the heck is wrong with you?!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.text: M-Mais qu'est-ce que vous avez, bon sang ?!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.orig: You... what is it with this place?!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.text: Toi... Qu'est quoi le bins avec cet endroit ?!
Toi aussi, tu peux pas te déconnecter ?
... Nan... Aucun de nous le peut.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.orig: Hey Metal Face! Talk to me!
DAMN IT! THIS CAN'T BE REAL!!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/408/setti.text: BON SANG ! C'EST JUSTE PAS POSSIBLE QUE ÇA SOIT COMME ÇA !

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: I just died and respawned, didn't I?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Je suis juste mort et je suis réapparu, c'est ça ?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: [nods]
Well, at least we won't die in real life when we die in-game. That's something.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Bon, au moins on meurt pas dans la vie réelle quand on meurt dans le jeu. C'est déjà ça.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: You remember that strange feeling I mentioned before?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Tu te souviens de mes sensations étranges dont je parlais ?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: I figured it out.\. I can't remember things.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: J'ai enfin trouvé pourquoi.\. Je n'arrive plus à me souvenir des choses.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: I can't remember what... is outside of the game.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Je n'arrive plus à me rappeler... ce qu'il y a en dehors du jeu.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: Is it the same for you?
[nods]
I see...
Things are just very blurry right now. Do you think our memories will return?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Les choses me semblent encore trop floues en ce moment. Tu penses que nos souvenirs vont revenir ?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: [nods]
Did... did it already happen for you?
[nods]
That... is good to know.
There's got to be a way out of this.\. There just has to be.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Il doit forcément y avoir un moyen de sortir d'ici.\. C'est obligé.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: Let's return to our rooms, ok?
Maybe there is a way to properly rest in there, however that works.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Peut-être qu'il y a un moyen de pouvoir vraiment se reposer là-dedans, peu importe comment ça marche.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: [nods]
Lea, do I understand this correctly? All the avatars in this area cannot log out?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Lea, j'ai bien compris ? Tous les Avatars de la région ne peuvent pas se déconnecter ?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: [nods]
...Why?
Sorry, I do not know. This is all extremely bizarre.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Désolé, je ne sais pas. Tout cela est extrêmement bizarre.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: I looked a bit into this place...
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.text: Je me suis renseigné un peu sur cet endroit...

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/411/setti.orig: Lea, is something the matter?
Just go ahead, I will tell you later.
Head back to your room in the \c[3]Dormitory\c[0].

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Here we are in the \c[3]town center\c[0].
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: Et nous voilà au \c[3]centre de la ville\c[0].

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: The town doesn't really have a name, so let's just stick with \c[3]Vermillion Town\c[0] for now.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: La ville n'a pas vraiment de nom, donc on n'a qu'à l'appeler la \c[3]Cité de Vermillion\c[0].

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Vermillion Town! Home of the metal blocks and endless pipes.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: La Cité de Vermillion ! La demeure des blocs métalliques et des tuyaux sans fins.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Nobody actually knows what's in the pipes though.\. We're probably best off not knowing.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: Personne ne sait vraiment ce qu'il y a dans les tuyaux, par contre.\. C'est probablement mieux ne pas le savoir.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Vermillion town is also home of these friendly metal-armored fellows.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: La Cité de Vermillion est aussi la demeure de ces sympathiques collègues de métal.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Like most folks, they don't like to be hit. They really don't like it.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: ... qui, comme beaucoup, ne supportent pas qu'on les frappe. Ils n'aiment vraiment pas ça.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: But what am I saying? You saw what happened yesterday.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: Mais qu'est-ce que je raconte ? Tu as bien vu ce qui s'est passé hier.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Also be especially careful about that area in the north. They really don't like you to be there.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: Sinon il faut bien faire attention à ne pas trainer dans cet endroit au nord. Ils n'aiment vraiment pas nous voir là-bas.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Well what am I saying? You already went ahead and explored the whole area, right?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: Mais bon, qu'est-ce que je raconte ? Tu y es déjà allé et tu as exploré les lieux, non ?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Then again, folks were talking about some nice treasure you can get when you manage to sneak past them.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: Mais sinon, les gens du coin disent qu'un trésor attend ceux qui réussissent à passer à travers eux sans se faire voir.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Now let's exit the town \c[3]to the west\c[0]!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: Maintenant, quittons la ville vers l'\c[3]ouest\c[0] !

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.orig: Head to the west from \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - West Town\c[0] to proceed with Lukas' tour.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/412/setti.text: Allez à l'ouest de la \c[3]Cité Ouest de \v[area.arid.name]\c[0] pour continuer la visite de Lukas.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/413/setti.orig: Welcome to my little \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland Tour\c[0]!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/413/setti.text: Bienvenue dans ma petite \c[3]Visite guidée de \v[area.arid.name]\c[0] !

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/413/setti.orig: I will show you all the remarkable sights of this truly underappreciated landscape.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/413/setti.text: Je vais vous présenter toutes les particularités remarquables de ce magnifique paysage qui est si mal apprécié.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/413/setti.orig: Talk to Lukas in \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - West Town\c[0] to proceed with his tour.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/413/setti.text: Parlez à Lukas dans la \c[3]Cité Ouest de \v[area.arid.name]\c[0] pour continuer sa visite.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/419/setti.orig: I can't believe we're stuck here with nothing to do.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/419/setti.text: C'est pas possible qu'on puisse être coincé ici et qu'il y ait rien à faire pour nous.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/419/setti.orig: Should we just go out and grind a bit?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/419/setti.text: Est-ce qu'il faut se bouger et grinder un peu ?
Nan... J'ai pas tellement envie là.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.orig: Those markers will catch the laser beams. Use them for your protection.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.text: Ces marqueurs vont attraper les faisceaux lasers. Utilise-les pour t'en protéger.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.orig: Alright Lea, we are ready to start.
Here is what you need to do, listen closely.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.text: Voici ce qu'il faut que tu fasses, écoute bien.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.orig: Our goal is to \c[3]zap every Evotar in this area\c[0].
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.text: Notre but est de \c[3]toucher tous les Évotars de la région\c[0].

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.orig: For every Evotar there are \c[3]3 steps to follow\c[0].
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.text: Pour chaque Évotar, il y a \c[3]3 étapes à respecter\c[0].

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.orig: \c[3]First\c[0]: You need to defeat a nearby \c[3]Shredder unit\c[0] to start the \c[3]Fixation Routine\c[0].
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.text: \c[3]Premièrement\c[0] : Il faut vaincre un \c[3]Découpeur\c[0] pour démarrer la \c[3]Routine de Fixation\c[0].
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.note: game doesnt use shredder as ennemy description.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.orig: \c[3]Second\c[0]: Move the defeated Shredder \c[3]close to the Evotar\c[0] to \c[3]fixate it\c[0].
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.text: \c[3]Deuxièmement\c[0] : Déplace le Découpeur vaincu \c[3]près de l'Évotar\c[0] pour pouvoir \c[3]le fixer\c[0].

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.orig: \c[3]Third\c[0]: The \c[3]fixed Evotar\c[0] needs to be \c[3]hit by the laser\c[0].
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.text: \c[3]Troisièmement\c[0] : L'\c[3]Évotar fixé\c[0] doit être \c[3]touché par le faisceau laser\c[0].

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.orig: If you can't find any Evotars, \c[3]standing on Laser Catchers\c[0] will make them point at the nearest one.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.text: Si tu ne vois pas où sont les Évotars, \c[3]mets-toi sur un Attrape-Laser\c[0], et il te montrera la direction vers l'Évotar le plus proche.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.orig: Everyone, follow Lea and focus on fighting the shredders!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/424/setti.text: Emilie ! Schneider ! Suivez Lea et concentrez-vous pour combattre les découpeurs !

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/445/setti.orig: Spheromancer Lea! We found more players in the forest!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/445/setti.text: Spheromancer Lea ! On a trouvé d'autres joueurs dans la forêt !

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/445/setti.orig: Good! You can look for more Evotars further to the east!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/445/setti.text: Bien ! Vous pouvez en chercher d'autres plus à l'est !

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/451/setti.orig: Sup?\. We brought more Evotars from along the river!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/451/setti.text: Yo ça va ?\. On a ramené d'autres Évotars venant de la rivière !

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/451/setti.orig: Good! Please join Apollo and Joern in the east of the town!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/451/setti.text: Bien ! Si tu pouvais rejoindre Apollo et Joern à l'est de la ville !

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/455/setti.orig: Looks like we caught them all in this area.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/455/setti.text: On dirait qu'on les a tous eus dans cette zone.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/455/setti.orig: Emilie, Lukas, you both stay here and make sure that no enemies interfere with the Evotars.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/455/setti.text: Emilie, Lukas, vous restez ici et vous vous assurez qu'aucun ennemi ne fasse quelque chose aux Évotars.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/455/setti.orig: Lea, you head to the east and join with the others!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/455/setti.text: Lea, tu vas à l'est rejoindre les autres !

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/455/setti.orig: We got this area covered! Good luck over there, chérie!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/455/setti.text: On garde la zone sous contrôle ! Bonne chance là-bas, chérie !

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/456/setti.text: Oh !\. Regardez !\. Il se passe quelque chose !

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/456/setti.orig: They exploded!\. Just like Emilie back then!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/456/setti.text: Ils ont explosé !\. Exactement comme avant pour Emilie !

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/456/setti.orig: What?! Is that what happened to me?!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/456/setti.text: Quoi ?! C'est ça qui m'est arrivé ?!

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/459/setti.orig: Laser bridge! The only true kind of bridge!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/459/setti.text: Un pont laser !\. Le seul véritable type de pont !

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/460/setti.text: Un pont laser !\. Le meilleur de tous les ponts !

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Oh, hé !\. C'est encore quelqu'un d'autre !

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: I've been here before and saw a lot of players running around, acting strange.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Je suis déjà venu ici et j'ai vu plein de joueurs qui courraient partout et qui se comportaient bizarrement.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: And now it's all empty.\. What happened?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Et maintenant c'est tout vide.\. Qu'est-ce qui s'est passé ?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: Was it some kind of beta test?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: C'était un genre de Bêta test ?
On s'est déjà rencontrés avant, non ?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: You have sort of a knack in spotting me in strange places, don't you?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Tu as véritablement un talent pour me trouver dans les endroits les plus étranges, non ?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: You know what? This calls for a little reward!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Tu sais quoi ? Ça mérite une petite récompense !

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: Anyway...\. Nothing going on here, so I'll be off.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Sinon...\. Il se passe rien par ici, donc je vais m'en aller.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: Let's see what else I can find!
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Voyons voir ce que je peux trouver d'autre !

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: How did they manage to get into this place...\. and out again?
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Ils ont fait comment pour venir ici...\. et pour en ressortir ?

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: Yes, that is what I wonder as well.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Oui, c'est ce que je me demande aussi.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: Yes, I know. I did not manage to do that with you.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Oui, je sais. Je n'ai pas réussi à faire ça pour toi.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: It thought it was impossible without violating security constraints.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: Je pensais pas que c'était possible sans violer les contraintes de sécurité.

maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.orig: I suppose they must have found a better loophole.
maps/arid/town-2.json/entities/462/setti.text: J'imagine qu'ils ont trouvés un meilleur tour de passe-passe.
